string.text: My PDA is acting up during surges and psi-storms.
I can install a special coating that protects your PDA from external energy influences. That'll be 10000 rubles for materials and labor.
Done! Take your PDA. Now it will no longer crash during surges and psi-storms.
I heard that you have achieved success in registering objects in anomalies. Can you do the same with living objects?
Can. Do you want your PDA to record the activity of squads on the global map? Make a contribution to science in the amount of 10000 rubles, and I will set it up.
Fine. Give me your PDA. Yeah... so... click "Accept"... Done! Take your PDA, I did it all.
